column4: my eth0 is not set correctly, i've got another inet addr. can someone tell me how can I modify my eth0 please?
you mean system - admin - network, right?
i have wired connection enabled but it doesn't work..
do you know exactly which intel wireless card you have?
oh wait, were you trying to get internet through wired?
can you see your ethernet card in there?
there should be an IP on your LAN which acts as the gateway... like, do you have a router?
ah yeah k, then your ISP's gateway
i don't know what is it...
